name: Captain Admin
description:
Made for a 3 day game jam

Sound and music was taken from the free GDC Audio pack referenced below.
https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc

Made by myself and Luke White (Programmer)

*warning* offensive jokes and language used to demonstrate online hate. 

You play as a streamer in a virtual world where you have to ban the trolls hidden throughout the level while thanking your fans. Try to get as many points as you can before the timer ends!

Some controls may be missing in the game UI so they are as follows:
wasd - move 
space bar - Jump / double jump
shift - air dash 
left click - Ban projectile
right click - Like Projectile 
escape - Pause Menu

you can also run along walls and jump up walls.
